TopicTitle: Mk2 Lightning Cockpit for B9 Aerospace v1.3 (FAR drag fixed)

Articles.Content:
[quote name='BahamutoD']With some colors:

[URL]http://imgur.com/a/2Xp4w[/URL][/QUOTE]

Beautiful. This looks to me like it will go very well with stock.

Will the cockpit be opaque or like shown in the picture?

[quote name='Lee Harvey Teabag']Beautiful. This looks to me like it will go very well with stock.

Will the cockpit be opaque or like shown in the picture?[/QUOTE]

I tested it out with a transparent cockpit but it killed the framerate too much, so I'm going with opaque.

I finished the HUD, complete with a start up sequence!

[url]http://gfycat.com/ComfortableElatedGallinule[/url]
It looks great, are you planning to pre-fit radar into the nose - it'll save a bit of part clipping :)

[quote name='Darren9']It looks great, are you planning to pre-fit radar into the nose - it'll save a bit of part clipping :)[/QUOTE]

He says, and I quote, "that's the plan."

So, yeah.

[quote name='BahamutoD']Yes, they are meant to go along side Bac9's new Mk.2 parts, since they will be using a new cross section (the same shape as stock Mk2 parts).
I pretty much just need to do the IVA/internals and these will be ready, but then they would only fit with stock parts, while the texture only matches the new B9 parts. It's not too bad with stock parts though I guess.
[URL]http://imgur.com/a/ZfwLa[/URL]
[/QUOTE]
These are gorgeous!

Okay, HUD is done, and the interior is 95% done. I made another video:

[video=youtube;v92ZQKReK4U]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=v92ZQKReK4U[/video]
Dat HUD...
Is there any Q readout?

[quote name='Svm420']Is there any Q readout?[/QUOTE]

The Q indicators in the props I had didn't seem to be working, but I'll see what I can do.

Here's how the stock-a-like texture is coming along. What do you all think?

[img]http://puu.sh/lsOLy/a8c051e235.jpg[/img]
Stock-a-like looks nice, but that B9 variant is making me drooooool. Ever think about a shiny gold canopy?

[quote name='BahamutoD']The Q indicators in the props I had didn't seem to be working, but I'll see what I can do.

Here's how the stock-a-like texture is coming along. What do you all think?

[URL]http://puu.sh/lsOLy/a8c051e235.jpg[/URL][/QUOTE]

[IMG]http://utahvalley360.com/wp-content/uploads/2014/03/Mean-Girls-You-look-awesome.gif[/IMG]

Beautiful stock-a-like texture, Baha.

[quote name='achroma']Stock-a-like looks nice, but that B9 variant is making me drooooool. Ever think about a shiny gold canopy?[/QUOTE]

Maybe make the shiny gold canopy a tweakable? Edited November 21, 2015 by Lee Harvey Teabag

Alright here's what I think the final textures will be:

[imgur]0O8Zt[/imgur]

I don't think i'l be doing the shiny gold cockpit.. Doesn't seem to fit well with the style.

[quote name='BahamutoD']Alright here's what I think the final textures will be:

[url]http://imgur.com/a/0O8Zt[/url]

I don't think i'l be doing the shiny gold cockpit.. Doesn't seem to fit well with the style.[/QUOTE]

Would it be possible to use one of the right click change texture menu things to have different colors for the cockpit? The black is awesome, but I want to try both an opaque blue and a golden.

Anyway, it looks beyond awesome.
That stock-alike texture is amazing. I'm glad you decided to integrate the radar, which will help shave part count. Beautiful work!

The new part looks amazing. The old one doesn't seem to work for me though, as the node is rotated by 180Ã‚Â° and things only attach inside. I've tried to replace it with so older version I had from 0.25 or so which I know worked but still nothing. Is it something with 1.0.x or is it just me?

Anyway, good luck with the new part, I won't be using anything else when it comes out.

I have released the new version in a new thread here (only stock-alike version for now):

[url]http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/140460[/url]

I also went ahead an made a spaceplane variant. Take a look! Edited November 24, 2015 by BahamutoD
